name: HSP_ACCT_ORG_DON
description: This table holds the abstracted organ(s) donated by the patient associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account with the abstracted donated organ information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. Because multiple organs can be donated by a patient and stored on one hospital account, each abstracted donated organ will have a unique line number.

columns.name: ORG_TO_DONATE_C_NAME
columns.description: This abstracting item indicates the organ(s) donated by the patient.
